item.title: It's Not the Story's Fault You Thought You Were Still on the Ranch
item.description: Two short essays and one somewhat longer essay inspired by ‘Lonesome Dove’ (the miniseries).

item.title: Buffalo Sorting and My First Gambling Foray
item.description: Oh, that’s why gambling is addictive.

item.title: Riddled with Words: 'The Maltese Falcon'
item.description: Every bastard gets what’s coming to them.

item.title: Cinderella in Reverse: 'Roman Holiday'
item.description: Rather than putting the glass slipper on, Ann kicks it off.

item.title: Absence of Meaning in 'The Lighthouse'
item.description: Such a successful exercise in atmosphere that we forget that the thing weâ€™re watching may very well be about nothing.
